title: Te Voy a Enseñar a Querer
overview: Diana Rivera is a beautiful and brave young veterinarian. In a nightclub, he meets Pablo Méndez and rejects him for his arrogant rich-boy style. Pablo falls in love with her and decides to win her over. A few days later, Diana is hired to work at the Méndez ranch and meets Alejandro Méndez, Pablo's father. Alejandro Méndez is a successful rancher. Happily married to his wife Isabel and father of Pablo and Helena. He dedicates his time to what he is most passionate about, his ranch of fighting bulls and rejoneo horses, which together with his real estate business, allow him to enjoy a high standard of living reserved for few. His life changes drastically when his wife Isabel dies unexpectedly and he falls into a deep depression. Diana convinces him to fight again for the only thing that can bring him back to life. Together they will face adversity and fall in love with each other, but they do not dare to speak of love, for fear of not being reciprocated.
